boardgame.name: Adventures in the Rocket Patrol
Space Cadets: Away Missions
Spacemen vs Aliens
boardgame.description: Long before the threat of the Nemesis, before the perils of warp drive or the founding of our own Space Academy, humanity experienced a Golden Age of space exploration. The mineral riches of the thriving Moon colony inspired legions of hearty Earth citizens to seek their fortunes in space. Humble rockets probed the farthest reaches of the solar system in an eager quest for resources, and brave colonists forged homes wherever they could survive. Pioneer life was hard, but the men and women who worked and raised their families on those planets and asteroids had much to be proud of._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Then the rumors began _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;mdash; whispered tales of frontier abductions and sightings of mysterious creatures. By the time the secret invasion was exposed, the aliens were everywhere. Families had been stolen away by slavers from the stars, and the peace-loving survivors had no choice but to arm themselves and fight. Fight to stop the alien attacks! Fight to free the helpless abductees! Fight to throw the aggressors back into space and end forever their power to threaten humanity!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Thus was born the Rocket Patrol _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;ndash; an organization of brave and hearty women and men dedicated to defending humanity and taking the fight to the alien menace from the stars._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Space Cadets: Away Missions is a cooperative, scenario-based, tactical action game for 1-6 players, which is set in the Golden Age of science fiction. In this game, the third standalone title in the Space Cadets franchise of cooperative/team space-themed games from Stronghold Games, players take on the roles of adventurous human spacemen who explore UFOs, acquire Alien technology and fight hostile extraterrestrials._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Each turn, spacemen have three action points to spend on activities such as firing their atomic rifles, analyzing exotic equipment, or subduing the malicious Brain-in-a-Jar. When the spacemen are finished, the aliens take their turns by following simple movement and combat protocols; seven types of hostile aliens threaten the players, from the repulsive mind leeches to the rampaging titanic sentinels._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Space Cadets: Away Missions contains twenty scenarios linked in a campaign story. Each mission features different combinations of aliens on different spaceships, with hexagonal map tiles arranged to form flying saucers, rocket ships, space stations, etc. Cooperation, tactical planning and good dice are essential if the spacemen hope to overcome the relentless horde of little green men._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

result.value: Some necessary text - easily memorized or small crib sheet
Moderate in-game text - needs crib sheet or paste ups
Extensive use of text - massive conversion needed to be playable

listing.notes: A KS edition of the game, unopened, with promo book and cards.

**Hand-painted miniatures included!** This is for the Kickstarter version (Captains in the Rocket Patrol Level). This level includes all promo cards and the illustrated hardcover book. It also includes an extra set of hand-painted miniatures. Pictures can be provided upon request. This item was opened and all cardboard items punched and bagged, but never played. Shipping to be paid in full my buyer. Shipping price to be determined and added on in addition to list price.

This is the Cadet In The Rocket Patrol Kickstarter version which includes promo cards and hardback book with art,scenarios and biographies etc. All minis(unpainted) included. Played once only. Shipping not included. Ship to UK only.

This is for a brand new still in shrink wrap kickstarter edition of Space Cadets Away Missions with the bonus promo cards, hard back mission book, and the painted rocketeer minis. There is a slight tear in the plastic wrap on the front of the box, no bigger than 2 inches. Was shipped to me like this. No scratches on the box. Buyer will pay shipping which will be added onto the final price. I will ship UPS unless the buyer requests otherwise.

Brand new in shrink. KS Edition including book and promos. Please note that the book has a small white scuff mark on the cover (see pics), although I think it is the result of a printing error as all/most books seems to have this mark. £6 UK shipping via myHermes. Will only ship to the UK.
Kickstarter Edition including book. Full game with all minis and stuff from Kickstarter campaign.

Space Cadets: Away Missions ( Kickstarter Version: ENSIGN IN THE ROCKET PATROL ) ($119.00 Level) https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/strongholdgames/space-cadets-away-missions/description Includes: (1x) Full unopened game of Space Cadets: Away Missions, (1x) Kickstarter Illustrated Hardcover Book w/ (8x Promo Scenarios) _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp; More, (1) Pack of Promo cards (+14), (1) set of PAINTED Rocketeer plastic miniatures (+6) besides the unpainted set in the game box. Check the Kickstarter page above for more details or the BGG listing below for component list of the boxed game. http://boardgamegeek.com/boardgame/124827/space-cadets-away-missions Shipping and handling is via FedEx (US). Prefer Shipping only to the Continental US. Contact me separately for possible shipping to area_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s outside US to check viability.

Stronghold Games (SHG5001) Space Cadets: Away Missions is a co-operative, man-to-man combat action game for 1-6 players set during the bygone Golden Age of science fiction. In this game, the third standalone game in the Space Cadets franchise of cooperative/team space-themed games, players take on the roles of adventurous human Rocketeers who explore UFOs, acquire Alien technology and fight hostile extraterrestrials. The game contains 20 scenarios linked to create a campaign story. Adventures require cooperation, tactical planning, and some luck. Fun will be had and brains will be tested... literally.
Reserved.
